normalized: the ashes, which were the charred remains of its life, were riding on the wind and scattering onto the night streets.
asagi stared at that with apparent melancholy, when a ringtone rang from her mobile device.
it was a call from yamamoto, the boss of the third investigation division 〈section three〉.
having answered the call, yamamoto spoke words of gratitude to asagi, and gave her the gist of some freshly obtained information.
the artificial island floating on tokyo bay── apparently, there had been progress in their undercover investigation into the organization which controlled that place.
asagi turned her mobile device off.
and then, she looked back once more at the majuu, which had turned to ash.
almost all the cinders were now flying in the wind, and all that was lying there was blackened garbage.
without even changing expression, asagi turned her back on them.
the kunoichi quietly vanished into the dark of night.
